> " Yeah, fly, right.. I would if someone remembered ta install that capabi=
lity in me. Apparently somehow I missed the boat when that feature was ben'=
 built inta the Decepticons. Still kinda miffed about it too. Unfortunately=
 I'm stuck stickn' ta ground travel."

Scorponok nodded as a frown appeared=
 on his face. "You newer modeled
Decepticons with no flight capability." Sc=
orponok said, his voice
colored by annoyance and displeasure.  "What a wast=
e."

Swiftly he shifted into his large Scorpion mode. In this mode he was
f=
ully as large as an armored troop carrier, his claws were large
enough to e=
ngulf a warrior, At his rear a stinger was mounted that
could easily reach =
to his front, and could double as a cannon, and
multiple gun mounts positio=
ned along his frame.

He flexed his claws a couple times and then began to =
move quickly away
from the vicinity of the Ark and towards Hydras' base, "C=
ome on." he
said imperiously.

"I have reached Nightshift, but he can't fly=
. Scorponok said into his
radio link to Hydras, We will have to come back o=
n the ground."
